text: Mikela Ristoski (born 7 November 1989) is a Paralympic athlete from Croatia who competes in T20 classification track and field jump events. She won bronze for Croatia at the 2012 Summer Paralympics in the long jump (F20). Ristoski is a multiple medalist at both World and European Championship levels, and has been World champion in both the long jump (2011) and triple jump (2015). == References == == External links == * Category:Paralympic athletes of Croatia Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 2012 Summer Paralympics Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 2016 Summer Paralympics Category:Paralympic gold medalists for Croatia Category:Paralympic bronze medalists for Croatia Category:1989 births Category:Living people Category:Medalists at the 2012 Summer Paralympics Category:Medalists at the 2016 Summer Paralympics Category:People from Pula Category:Croatian female long jumpers Category:Croatian female triple jumpers Category:Croatian people of Macedonian descent Category:Paralympic medalists in athletics (track and field)
title: Mikela Ristoski
